snippet: Collectors are buzzing about the 50 Lambrecht vehicles that are still considered new, with, in some cases, plastic on their seats and stickers on their windows.
abstract: Collectors are buzzing about auction of 50 vehicles that were part of Ray Lambrecht's extensive collection of decades-old vehicles; cars are still considered new, with, in some cases, plastic on their seats and stickers on their windows; auctioneer says cars will be sold as-is.
lead_paragraph: Collectors are buzzing about the 50 Lambrecht vehicles that are still considered new, with, in some cases, plastic on their seats and stickers on their windows.

headline.main: The Car of Your Fantasies? It Comes With Caveats
headline.print_headline: The Car of Your Fantasies? It Comes With Caveats
